summary:
I am a professional journalist, editor, translator, recipe developer and content creator. My focus is gastronomy, wine, travel, art, culture and lifestyle texts. I write in both Dutch and English (US & UK).
In 2007, I graduated from Leiden University in the department of Dutch Studies/Golden Age Art History.
In the summer of 1998, I attended the International Study Programme for Journalism at the Hogeschool voor de Journalistiek in Utrecht.
Currently, I am chief editor to the North American magazine DUTCH (USA/Canada) and the high-end glossy Discover Benelux (UK). I am also sub-editor to Inside Rotterdam (NL) and a regular contributor to Reader's Digest (UK). My work has appeared in top France publications FRANCE Magazine (UK), French Property News (UK), En Route (NL) and Leven in Frankrijk (NL). I had a regular food & drinks column in French Property News and En Route. I was also responsible for the food and drink news pages in FRANCE Magazine.
My recipes have appeared in the Dutch women's weekly Vriendin, and my articles have been published in leading magazines Bouillon (NL), Culture (USA) and b.spirit (UK).
I am a professional translator for texts in my fields of expertise and have translated for Dutch publishing house Kosmos and newspaper Het Parool.

List of publications I've worked with:
Reader's Digest
FRANCE Magazine
French Property News
CULTURE the word on cheese
Discover Benelux
DUTCH
Het Parool
Bouillon
En Route
Leven in Frankrijk
Inside Rotterdam
b.spirit, (in-flight magazine Brussels Airlines)
Eastern Airways FR
Jamie Magazine Website
HELLO Amsterdam
Desserts Magazine
Family Matters Magazine
YOU/RUSH Amsterdam
AWAY Magazine, BE
Ackroyd Publications, BE
The Quercy & Gascony Local
Schiphol Magazine
The Dutch Daily News
The Holland Times
Koken.be
Holland Focus
XPat Journal
Ze.nl
Honest Cooking
The Provence Sun
The Languedoc Sun

Books featuring my work:
'Vis & Vega' (2011). Snor Publishers, Utrecht.
'Borrelhapjeskalender' (2013). Snor Publishers, Utrecht.

Contact me for: Journalism on food, wine, travel, art and culture/Content creation, especially on food and drink/Recipe development/Food writing/Translations/Editing/Proofreading/Advertorials

[{'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'La Douce Vie', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'La Douce Vie', 'description': 'Contact me for:
*Journalism:
My specialties are writing about food, wine, travel, lifestyle and culture. I have more than two decades of experience producing a wide variety of engaging content: from articles on travel, family and children, wine, lifestyle and history, to culinary columns, advertorials, book reviews and interviews. 

*Content creation, especially on France (travel, tourism, food & wine). Let me promote your region or business. I can offer you a full package deal that includes text, enticing photography, beautifully designed brochures (digital/print) and even professional film. Our mission is to make your destination or product shine, and our prices are competitive. Our services are available in English (UK & US) and Dutch. 

*Writing and editing of all kinds of texts:
Choosing the right words; paying meticulous attention to proper spelling, grammar, punctuation and syntax; adhering to your publication’s style and tone. I am the editor and senior vice president of the North American publication DUTCH, sub-editor and journalist for Inside Rotterdam. I was a regular writer, editor and translator for the Amsterdam-based tourist publication HELLO Amsterdam. I have also edited and translated tourist magazines such as RUSH and YOU.

*Recipe development: 
I have written recipes for a wide variety of publications, including one of the most popular Dutch women’s weekly magazines, Vriendin. My recipes are tested for taste and accuracy, and are always guaranteed to work, even for novice cooks.

*Translations: 
I have a degree in academic Dutch from the University of Leiden and have lived in the Netherlands for more than two decades. I have translated menus, newspaper articles, press releases, books and more. 

*Culinary consultancy

*Cooking films:
I can produce content in English or Dutch, and my work is accompanied by high-resolution professional photography at no extra cost. Video can also be delivered upon request.
